statements: UPDATE movement_of_goods SET shipment_date = '2022-10-15', destination_location = 'Warehouse B' WHERE shipment_id = 12345;
UPDATE movement_of_goods SET shipping_cost = 55.75, product_name = 'New Product', origin_location = 'Factory C' WHERE shipment_id = 54321;
UPDATE movement_of_goods SET shipping_cost = 1000.50, origin_location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE shipment_id = 12345
UPDATE movement_of_goods SET destination_location = 'Retail Store', shipping_cost = 750.75 WHERE shipment_id = 54321
UPDATE movements SET source_location = 'Warehouse A', destination_location = 'Retail Store' WHERE movement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE transportation_routes SET estimated_duration = 120, distance_in_km = 50.5 WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE movements SET destination_location = 'Warehouse XYZ' WHERE movement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transportation_routes SET estimated_duration = 120, distance_in_km = 300.5 WHERE route_id = '98765432-12ab-34cd-56ef-098765432112';
UPDATE goods SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 7;
UPDATE tracking SET location = 'Warehouse' WHERE goods_id = 12;
UPDATE goods SET quantity = quantity + 10, location = 'Warehouse' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE routes SET cost = cost * 1.1, distance = distance / 2 WHERE route_id = 201;
UPDATE products SET product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 'c98a03bb-61c1-4bb9-bcdc-829150caaed9';
UPDATE warehouses SET location_coordinates = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1.2345 -6.7890)') WHERE warehouse_id = 'f7e5c073-0391-4f1e-bba7-1ab89a92fa2e';

UPDATE shipments SET quantity = 20 WHERE shipment_id = 1001;
UPDATE products SET cost = 15.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 2003;
UPDATE shipments SET quantity = 10, sender_id = 100, receiver_id = 200 WHERE shipment_id = 1;
UPDATE warehouses SET availability = false, capacity = 50 WHERE warehouse_id = 3;
